name: Amaze 3D Roller Amazing Splat
description: A 3D paint rolling game. Swipe up, down, left, right, all around to fill up the unpainted maze with a cubic rolling tool painting through the unfilled mazes splashing the beautiful paints. Fill up each maze by rolling square with bright paint. Make sure you paint the whole puzzles because If you don’t fill even one square, you might be stuck for eternity!
